    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10360622">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10360622">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10360622">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Lesson Plan Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10360622">
          <div id="boxatt10360622" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12599313">
              <a id="link_12599313" href="http://www.thegateway.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599313,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Lesson Plans'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599313}); ">
               Gateway to 21st Century Skills
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides access to teaching tools, lesson plans, assessments, and more found on federal, state, university, non-profit and commercial websites.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599346">
              <a id="link_12599346" href="http://www.nea.org/tools/LessonPlans.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599346,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Lesson Plans'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599346}); ">
               NEA Lesson Plans
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Lesson plans from the National Education Association.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599303">
              <a id="link_12599303" href="http://www.thinkfinity.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599303,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Lesson Plans'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599303}); ">
               Thinkfinity
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               K-12 teaching and learning resources presented in "nine discipline-specific, standards-based Web sites. Each site includes lessons for teachers, activities to use in and out of the classroom, games for young children and teens, adult literacy resources and reference materials for anyone in the education field, as well as for parents and afterschool practitioners."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10716865">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10716865">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10716865">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Databases with Lesson Plans
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10716865">
          <div id="boxatt10716865" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link13007735">
              <a id="link_13007735" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=eric" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13007735,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Lesson Plans'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335240}); ">
               ERIC
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals, books, documents, and more in education and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
